text: Ajith Amerasekera from the Texas Instruments Inc., in Dallas, TX was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for leadership in semiconductor innovation and contributions to circuit design. Amerasekera was Chief Technical Officer for TI's ASIC Business Unit.Ajith Amerasekera, Director, Product Acceleration, High Performance Analog Business, Texas Instruments His Ph.D. is in Electrical Engineering and Physics. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:American chief technology officers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ajith Amerasekera
